metadata.name: Yarokuzo
metadata.description:
ジャロクゾ / Yarokuzo is a representative of a group of magical creatures, namely dragons. 

His power is electricity. It is the only one of its kind, nothing is known about its origin.

 The age is several thousand years - this is no longer a young dragon. 

Habitat - ruins. Thought to have been dormant for centuries, it is said to have attacked human settlements when it was active. 
Renowned for its strength. 

According to legend, he was a free spirit who, in a fit of rage, killed his loved one (according to various versions, his brother / mother) and now, as a punishment, wears metal armor that limits him from all the joys of life, freedom, emotions and communication with spirits and the Divine. 

Often symbolically depicted with flowers - they personify his soul and repentance, which are torn out of the burden of crime, presented in the form of armor.
